Title: Comic Sans
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Sara Hess, Piper Kerman (book), Sian Heder (story editor), Lauren Morelli (story editor), Nick Jones (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Vee starts her inmate run business, Black Cindy is having issues , Bennett gets blackmailed, and Piper begins her newspaper club.
